summary: Get history review id list for one seller(reviews within 3 months can be get)
description: Get history review id list for one seller(reviews within 3 months can be get)

query.name: start_time
query.description: Start Time, timestamp in millisecond, this is the same with "create_time" in the response data of interface (/review/seller/list/v2)；The time range cannot exceed 7 days

query.name: end_time
query.description: End Time, timestamp in millisecond, this is the same with "create_time" in the response data of interface (/review/seller/list/v2)；The time range cannot exceed 7 days

query.name: current
query.description: The current pageNo, default value = 1, max value = 50

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/review/seller/history/list')
request.add_api_parameter("item_id", "2419854443")
request.add_api_parameter("order_id", "1000000000")
request.add_api_parameter("start_time", "1662134400000")
request.add_api_parameter("end_time", "1662739200000")
request.add_api_parameter("current", "1")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/review/seller/history/list')
request.add_api_param('item_id', '2419854443')
request.add_api_param('order_id', '1000000000')
request.add_api_param('start_time', '1662134400000')
request.add_api_param('end_time', '1662739200000')
request.add_api_param('current', '1')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: "current" is above the limit, the max value is 50
Only support checking 90 days of history data
Only support checking 7days data at one time

error_codes.message: Mp3 Seller not support the api -apipath
error_codes.description: MP3 sellers cannot call the current API, please readthis document for a list of APIs that can be called by MP3 sellers, and you can call the GetSeller API and check the marketplaceEaseMode field to confirm that the current seller is of type MP3.
